summary: Crystal is a healer, trainer follower available in UNP or CBBE; with human or elf ears.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=6][b]Crystal[/b][/size][/color]

[i][color=#d0e0e3]~Available Individually or Merged~[/color][/i]
(Follower Based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19661269/?]crystalpeach's[/url] Breton Preset)

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/dkq7tsop3/20161007212335_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Crystal
Race:  Custom Breton Race
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.02
Weight:  75
Body:  Base UNP & CBBE
Skin:  Demoniac (2K)
Trainer:  Restoration
Armor:  Linkle Outfit (increased armor rating)
Weapon:  Full arsenal of spells & Staff of Ice Spike
Location:  Kynesgrove - Braidwood Inn

Class:  Combat Spellsword
Style:  Human Magic

Levels with player.  Breton traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses:  All Magic, Archery, Light Armor, Heavy Armor
Perks:  Restoration, Illusion, and Alteration branches.

Tested with AFT & EFF
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3jzm92wp3/20161008024008_1.jpg[/img]

To play as Crystal please find preset [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79099/?]here[/url].

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
Skyrim & Update

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Lync[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known_Issues.png[/img]
Some clipping was noticed with the necklace during testing.

AFT did not always register the training dialog.  No issues with EFF.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/e7z6q0lqf/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4v36zn7d3/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/w0kqxw2yv/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19661269/?]crystalpeach[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*
A:  Anything related to the appearance then I will not without the permission of crystalpeach.

Q:  Healing?
A:  Yes, think Danica.

Q:  I'm not getting the training option with AFT?
A:  Please see known issues above.
A:  If anyone has any repair suggestions please private message me.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cdhquj9c7/CreditsResources.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD[/url]

[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3148-yevmods-makeup-pack-ymmp-2k-4k/]YevMods - Makeup Pack[/url]
Bethesda

*If I forgot anyone, please kindly remind me.  Thank You*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/b4ygmn6rr/Permissions.png[/img]
This follower is the combination of the work of others.  Please obtain their permissions in addition to mine.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/t2nd8cqvb/20161008033303_1.jpg[/img]
